title: Ruthless Media Clash
description: Fellas offer a tribute to American hero Bob Dole, discuss Dana Milbank's liberal spin control, and talk about Chris Cuomo's firing from CNN. The progrum welcomes WBT-FM radio host Brett Winterble and Washington Examiner correspondent David Drucker for interviews.
author: hello@ruthlesspodcast.com (John Ashbrook, Brett Winterble, Josh Holmes, David Drucker, Michael Duncan, Comfortably Smug)
